New Records: Lautaro Martínez broke the record for most goals in the 2024 Copa América with 6 goals
Key Match Events: Lautaro Martínez scored the winning goal in the 112th minute of extra time
Pre-Game Insights: Argentina was the favorite to win the tournament and never trailed during the competition
Post-Match Reflections: The game was marred by a delay of more than an hour due to fans rushing the stadium
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played in Miami Gardens, Florida
Others: Lionel Messi was subbed out in the 66th minute with an ankle injury
